nodes.text: The Resource Recon Speeder was a model from SoroSuub Corporation. It was five meters long and could hover five meters above the surface. It carried two crew (a pilot and a sensor operator), two passengers, and 70 kilograms of cargo. It cost 30,000 credits new. Its sensors could be used to locate resources for mining and to make maps of areas traversed. Lant Mining Corporation used them for these purposes and to direct fleets of Multi-Environment Mining Droid MEMD-2s.
